text: Àwọn Lárúbáwá oko sọ pé: "A gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo." Sọ pé: "Ẹ̀yin kò gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo." Ṣùgbọ́n ẹ sọ pé: "A gba ’Islām." níwọ̀n ìgbà tí ìgbàgbọ́ òdodo kò tí ì wọ’nú ọkàn yín. Tí ẹ bá tẹ̀lé (àṣẹ) Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀, (Allāhu) kò níí dín kiní kan kù fun yín nínú (ẹ̀san) àwọn iṣẹ́ yín. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run
